title: San Francisco/Mission
name: The Attic
content: Dive bar for the elderly hipster and other local, miserable wretches. Decent reasonably priced drinks. Open and drafty; on (frequent) cold evenings you'll be drinking with your coat on. Closest good dive to the awesome El Farolito taqueria at 24th and Mission: getting Farolito's massive nachos to go to eat at the Attic over cocktails is recommended.
